posts.title: Spicy Chocolate Wedges
posts.content: Kick things up a notch at dessert time by indulging in some spicy chocolate wedges. These delectable morsels combine a rich dark chocolate with a touch of Tabasco sauce to bring you a treat your palette will love and your anus will loathe.

posts.title: Handgun Egg Frying Mold
posts.content: Cook up a loaded breakfast with this egg frying mold that is shaped like a handgun. Perfect for cooking up a breakfast that’s to die for, this functional pistol shaped egg frying mold is made from stainless steel and work great for cooking up breakfast for an NRA meeting.

posts.title: Pineapple Slicer
posts.content: Now you can enjoy your favorite tropical fruit without having to deal with the carving of the tough exterior. This ingenious device drills through the pineapple so you’re left with nice juicy slices in just seconds. It’s the most convenient way to enjoy this delicious fruit.

posts.title: WiFi Smart Outlet Plug Adapter
posts.content: Control your lights and appliances from anywhere in the world by plugging them into this WiFi smart outlet plug adapter. It allows you to control any appliance plugged into the outlet using your smartphone so that you can switch it on and off even if you’re not home.

posts.title: Wooden Bathtub Caddy
posts.content: Keep everything necessary for a relaxing soak close by when you’re in the tub using this wooden bathtub caddy. This lovely all-bamboo caddy sports accents like detachable side trays and slots carved into the surface to accommodate all your accessories.

posts.title: LED Ice Cubes
posts.content: Get the party started from the moment you serve the first drink with the LED ice cubes. These decorative and functional ice cubes cool your drink while simultaneously illuminating it from within. The vibrant lights make even the dullest cocktails look mind-blowing.

posts.title: Magicka Mayhem Wizardry Card Game
posts.content: Give your weekly game nights a fun twist with Magicka Mayhem – the card game of magic, spells, and pure mayhem! You can rain fiery ouchies on your wizard enemies, protect yourself using elemental shields, and even summon elementals to do your bidding.

posts.title: Couch Guest Book
posts.content: Immortalize your riveting social life as you keep a running log of all the high profile guests that have plopped down beside you with the couch guest book. Now your guests can leave a little something besides just their butt print on the cushion.

posts.title: Intricate Illustrations Coloring Book
posts.content: Put your coloring skills to the test by trying to complete a page from the intricate illustrations coloring book. Each page comes chock-full of impossibly convoluted designs that’ll make coloring inside the lines into a Herculean task.

posts.title: The Man Bowl
posts.content: Satisfy your beast sized morning appetite like a true hombre with the man bowl. This high quality ceramic bowl  is designed to like a classic dog bowl and measures a massive 10 inches all around while sporting a bold “MAN” label on the side for added manliness.

posts.title: Criminal Coffee Mug
posts.content: The criminal coffee mug provides the perfect excuse for morning tardiness. Next time you’re running late just tell your boss the truth –  you got mugged by a <del>coffee mug</del> thug with a menacing 5 o’clock shadow, aggressive demeanor, and sinister ski mask.

posts.title: Pornburger Book
posts.content: Satiate your gluttony and lust by flipping through the pages of Pornbuger. In the book, culinary-school-educated chef Mathew Ramsey shows how to master the art of cooking the perfect burger alongside images of mouth-watering creations like the “Horn Dog”.
